scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install --include=dev && npm run build:safe
scripts.build:frontend: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.rmSync('dist', {recursive: true, force: true});" && tsc --noEmitOnError false && vite build
scripts.copy:frontend: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('backend/dist')) fs.rmSync('backend/dist', {recursive: true, force: true}); fs.cpSync('dist', 'backend/dist', {recursive: true});"
